msgQueueEnvVars.name: AWS_SQS_QUEUE_NAME
msgQueueEnvVars.notes: Name or topic of the queue in the cloud

msgQueueEnvVars.name: AWS_SQS_REGION
msgQueueEnvVars.notes: AWS region in which the queue is defined

msgQueueEnvVars.name: AWS_SQS_SECRET_KEY
msgQueueEnvVars.notes: IAM secret key for access key
